name: real man donuts
descriptiontwo: Homemade glazed doughnuts are the sweet, pillowy answer to what's for dessert? This top-rated doughnut recipe boasts a light, buttery taste with a perfectly decadent glaze that's finger-licking good.
description: Milk, Yeast, Sugar, Eggs, Butter, Salt and Vanilla Extract, Nutmeg and Flour

name: real man cookies
descriptiontwo: This is the best chocolate chip cookies recipe ever! No funny ingredients, no chilling time, etc. Just a simple, straightforward, amazingly delicious, doughy yet still fully cooked, chocolate chip cookie that turns out perfectly every single time!
desciption: Butter, Eggs, Vanilla, Baking soda, Water, Salt, Flour, Chocolate chips, and nuts (optional)
